DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Purpose : 1 ) compare three conservative treatment approach subject femoroacetabular impingement syndrome ( FAI ) , 2 ) analyze functional outcome comparatively across group . 2 . Interventions provide base randomized assignment . Group 1 receive treatment base identified impairment treat twice weekly address say impairment hip manual therapy exercise , well prescriptive exercise strengthen mobility hip . Group 2 receive prescriptive exercise program . Group 3 control group ( supervise neglect ) 3 . Primary outcome data analysis involve mixed design ( repeated measure ) ANOVA assessment primary outcome measure HAGOS . Secondary analysis include chi square analysis ( PASS , surgery 6 month , adverse event ) , ANCOVA ( PPMs , expectation measure ) , appropriate comparative measure . None propose treatment consider outside 'standard practice ' .
